amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund to improve the health care system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 639 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 639 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S3698-3702; text: CR S3699-3700) To establish a reserve fund to improve the health care system.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 639 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
